column1: Kata Robata////I highly reccomend coming to Kata if you love to experience
column3: and eat yummy food. Came here on a Friday night with reservations
column4: arrived early and still sat us immediately. The atmosphere is "cool" and upbeat; low light
column6: very comtemporary. Out waiter was amazing. Very helpful
column8: knew what he was talking about
column10: and always checking in on us. He was aware that it was our first time at Kata and he didn't try to upsell us at all. He made recommendations that he thought we would enjoy and are the better options. He seemed like a very proud employee at Kata
column11: which tells a lot about how they treat their staff.
